description: Number of representations of n as a sum of distinct Lucas numbers 1,3,4,7,11 ... (A000204).
references: A. Brousseau, Fibonacci and Related Number Theoretic Tables. Fibonacci Association, San Jose, CA, 1972, p. 58.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..9349
Casey Mongoven, Sonification of multiple Fibonacci-related sequences, Annales Mathematicae et Informaticae, 41 (2013) pp. 175-192.
formula: G.f.: prod(n>=1, 1 + x^L(n) ) where L(n) = A000204(n). - _Joerg Arndt_, Jul 14 2013
prog: (PARI)L(n)=fibonacci(n+1) + fibonacci(n-1);N = 66;  x = 'x + O('x^N);gf = prod(n=1, 11, 1 + x^L(n) );Vec(gf) \\ _Joerg Arndt_, Jul 14 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, May 29 2000
